title: Simple red velvet cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '120g butter', '300g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g self raising flour', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '240ml buttermilk', '2 tablespoons red food colouring', 'For the buttercream', '125g butter, softened', '125g cream cheese', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '200g icing sugar', '50g almonds to decorate (optional)']
